document.full_text: the chairman of libya's national oil corporation has defected from muammar gaddafi's administration and fled to neighboring tunisia, a tunisian security source said on tuesday.
document.title: libya's top oil official defects: tunisian source
lines_and_colors: the chairman of libya's national oil corporation has defected from muammar gaddafi's administration and fled to neighboring tunisia, a tunisian security source said on tuesday.
